name: Brianlinuxing.GitHub.io
tagline: Brian Linuxing, decades of opinions and experience at your fingertips!
body:
### Welcome to my GitHub site

I am rather fond of Github, thus I decided to host my thoughts on it.

### Technology

I have been using computers and technology since the early 1970s. I have done the lot: managed Mainframes, set-up Datacentres, coded in Assembler (MACRO-10), FORTRAN, COBOL, etc the whole ball of wax!

### Linux 

I prefer to use and do Linux, whenever I can, having started with Slackware in 1994. I can talk about the topic for hours! I give free classes on Linux in London. 

### Mobile

I am hoping to release some mobile apps by the beginning of 2016.

### Ideas and a critical eye

After 30+ years of IT I tend to see the world differently and brim with ideas on how to do things better, smarter and with less hassle. I cover a wide range of technology with a critical eye.

As a freelancer, I provide a high degree of objectivity on modern problems and issues. I am always open to sensible offers. Or just ask me a question! 

My ever on-going [Wiki](https://github.com/brianlinuxing/brianlinuxing.github.io/wiki) has some quick solutions to tricky technological [gotchas.](http://www.merriam-webster.com/dictionary/gotcha)
